comments.body: Does this test still need a context?
TODO(jonahwilliams): Change to testWithoutContext when Status no longer uses the Stopwatch from the context.

For testing, can you make this use a Fake instance or perhaps use a BufferLogger instance instead?

We're still deciding what exactly we're going to do with mockito wrt to null-safety, the code generation changes are not really palatable so avoiding adding more tests which heavily depend on it will help us out a ton

Ugh.  Using ` Mock` here was useful since it can verify the arguments (and it caught an argument that wasn't forwarded by the code I move from `DelegateLogger`).  I'll see if I can come up with something else.
